Text.Page: So you know about the Necromancer's Orb, right? Of course you do. Well, I need a fragment of it. Don't ask why, I just do. And I'm willing to trade for it.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Willing to trade what?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Why, a piece of Kelsaik's beak, that's what! For a measly two necromancer's orb fragments. It's the deal of a lifetime, is what it is. So come back around when you have those orb fragments, you hear?
I see you have the orb fragments. Good as your word, and so am I. Here's what I promised you in return. You can always count on me.
